greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of permutations of 10 copies of 1..n introduced in order 1..n with no element equal to another within a distance of 1.
comment: In general, for r > 1, row r of A322013 is asymptotic to r^(r*n + 1/2) * n^((r-1)*n) / ((r!)^n * exp((r-1)*(n+1))). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 24 2018
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..63
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Nov 16 2018
